entry.name: AllianceAccepted
entry.value: "Yes! With our forces combined, there will be no one to dare challenge us."

entry.name: AllianceRejected
entry.value: "Do not take it the wrong way, %2%, but not right now. Thanks."

entry.name: DeclareWar
entry.value: "Alright, the time has come. From here on out it's total war."

entry.name: Eliminated
entry.value: "We shall meet again."

entry.name: Goodbye
entry.value: "We're done here."

entry.name: Greet0
entry.value: "What do you want, %2%? I have better things to do than talk to the likes of you."

entry.name: Greet1
entry.value: "Greetings, %3%! Though I am busy devising new strategies, there is always some time for you."

entry.name: Greet2
entry.value: "Greetings, comrade %2%! How can I help you out?"

entry.name: NonAggressionPactAccepted
entry.value: "Good choice. There is enough warmongering to be done elsewhere."

entry.name: NonAggressionPactRejected
entry.value: "Nah, I prefer my soldiers to be on edge. Makes them harder. Stronger."

entry.name: NonAggressionPactTerminated
entry.value: "To be frank, I considered this option myself already. Time for some troop exercises at the borders."

entry.name: OfferAlliance
entry.value: "Shall we join our forces?"

entry.name: OfferNonAggressionPact
entry.value: "Let us sign a non-aggression pact."

entry.name: OfferPeace
entry.value: "Was an outstanding war so far, but how about a ceasefire to let the soldiers visit their families?"

entry.name: OfferResearchPact
entry.value: "Should we share our research efforts?"

entry.name: OfferTradingPact
entry.value: "How about a sweet trading pact among peers?"

entry.name: PeaceAccepted
entry.value: "Was an awful lot of bloodshed these last years, I agree."

entry.name: PeaceRejected
entry.value: "Nope, we will finish you off. A quick and painless death for %3%."

entry.name: ResearchPactAccepted
entry.value: "Sure thing. If you discover some outstanding war machine, let us know."

entry.name: ResearchPactRejected
entry.value: "The war machines we currently research wield such power that making them available to anyone else would be -- irresponsible."

entry.name: ResearchPactTerminated
entry.value: "Discovered a cute new technology? Whatever."

entry.name: TerminateAlliance
entry.value: "Our strong alliance surely had its merits. But not anymore."

entry.name: TerminateNonAggressionPact
entry.value: "The borders are too quiet, I'm canceling this silly non-aggression pact."

entry.name: TerminateResearchPact
entry.value: "The scientific profit from our research pact is too one-sided, so I'm canceling it."

entry.name: TerminateTradingPact
entry.value: "To be frank, I think our trading pact is simply not profitable enough for us, and hereby nullified."

entry.name: TradingPactAccepted
entry.value: "Ah sure, why not. But do not try to smuggle any weapons."

entry.name: TradingPactRejected
entry.value: "I know our goods are sought after, but giving them to everyone would make them, well, less exclusive. I hope you understand..."

entry.name: TradingPactTerminated
entry.value: "I see this is an insult to my integrity. Watch your step, %2%."

entry.name: WarAccepted
entry.value: "%2%, you must have lost your sanity to challenge me. Accepted, of course!"
